# Skeena {#skeena}

Here is the information available for steelhead CUs in the Skeena region. Steelhead CUs in this region were defined in [Tautz et al. 2011](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_b_979/).

![Map of the Skeena region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer and steelhead Conservation Units from [Tautz et al. 2011](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_b_979/).](_bookdown_files/map_skeena_region.png)

![Map of the Skeena region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer and steelhead monitoring locations.](_bookdown_files/map_skeena_monitoring.png)

## *Upper Skeena Headwaters*

CU id 280


### Populations

```{r echo=FALSE}
cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")


cu_list[ (cu_list$cu_id %in% c("280")), c(3,4,11)]

```
### Spawner Surveys 

Data Deficient 

### Juvenile Surveys 

_Historical data available (ex. Bustard et al. 1994). Pending extraction from PDF reports._

### Hatchery Releases 

_Data will be available for this indicator, pending processing - comprehensive database of steelhead hatchery releases from the Province of BC and Freshwater Fisheries Society._

Data Source: [Province of British Columbia Data Catalogue](https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/)

## *Middle Skeena*

CU id 285

![CU boundaries](_bookdown_files/285.cu.png)

### Populations

```{r echo=FALSE}
cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")


cu_list[ (cu_list$cu_id %in% c("285")), c(3,4,11)]

```

### Spawner Surveys 

_Historical data is available for this indicator for the Kitwanga River (ex. Gitanyow Fisheries Authority 2002, Peard & McCubbing 2011). Pending extraction from PDF reports and review._

### Juvenile Surveys 

_Data exists for this indicator - juvenile steelhead have been enumerated in the Kitwanga River at the [Kitwanga Smolt Enumeration Facility](http://www.gitanyowfisheries.com/projects/kitwanga-smolt-enumeration-facility) and there are additional historic data collected by the Province of BC (ex. Beere 1993). Pending extraction of published data from PDF reports and access to existing unpublished data._

### Hatchery Releases 

_Data will be available for this indicator, pending processing - comprehensive database of steelhead hatchery releases from the Province of BC and Freshwater Fisheries Society._

Data Source: [Province of British Columbia Data Catalogue](https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/)

### Spawner Surveys 

![The figures display the number of spawning steelhead observed in each stream each year. Data Source: [Saimoto, R. S. & R.K. Saimoto 2013](https://psf.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Download-PDF26-1.pdf).](_bookdown_files/Steelhead9724.ind.stream.jpg)
